name: Writer's toolbox
description:
Organizing the details for your story can be tough. This template helps you create visual plot lines, character profiles, worldbuilding documentation, and much more! No longer will you have to search your stack of sticky notes or pages in your notes app for a single detail. Keep everything about your novel in one place!


This template is fully customizable, but is built with Fantasy / Sci-fi in mind. However, any genre can take advantage of these these tools!
